data.lyric:
[ti:Stuck In A Dream (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Mosey/Gunna]
[al:Stuck In A Dream (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]Stuck In A Dream (Explicit) - Lil Mosey/Gunna
[00:01.69]Lyrics by：Lathan Echols/Sergio Giovanni Kitchens/Royce David Pearson
[00:03.39]Composed by：Lathan Echols/Sergio Giovanni Kitchens/Royce David Pearson
[00:05.09]Oh-oh
[00:05.63]Ayy Royce you did it right here
[00:07.06]Still poppin' Xans 2019
[00:08.63]Pour up the lean got me stuck in a dream
[00:10.51]Started hittin' licks back in 2014
[00:12.01]I got the ice on me dripping Céline
[00:13.69]Flyers came in off a hunt
[00:15.44]Me and my n***as still drippin' for fun
[00:17.25]Been knew I was the one
[00:18.90]Still got n***as on the run yeah
[00:21.17]I got these diamonds my chain swing
[00:22.96]I got these bands ain't s**t changed
[00:24.56]Talkin' like you want that smoke smoke
[00:26.21]We want the same thing brrt
[00:27.92]I got a brand new chain chain
[00:29.70]Then I wear ten on my neck mhm
[00:31.43]Then I got a new Patek yeah
[00:33.22]Fly in that b***h with a Tech
[00:34.57]Six on a new fit fifty for a drop top
[00:36.17]I was off a bean the Tech made me Wock' talk
[00:38.00]Never been a lame ain't s**t to make her top drop
[00:39.73]Smokin' on gas ooh I lift off
[00:41.37]Last year was broke this year flooded a Patek
[00:42.77]I keep forty racks in my Seattle attic
[00:44.55]I hit her two times then you n***as can have it
[00:46.63]My young n***as pull up and shoot like the Magic
[00:48.25]Still poppin' Xans 2019
[00:49.65]Pour up the lean got me stuck in a dream
[00:51.70]Started hittin' licks back in 2014
[00:53.14]I got the ice on me dripping Céline
[00:54.91]Flyers came in off a hunt
[00:56.58]Me and my n***as still drippin' for fun
[00:58.32]Been knew I was the one
[00:59.76]Still got n***as on the run yeah
[01:01.82]I made it out of the hood hood
[01:03.48]I still got some dawgs on the run yeah
[01:05.24]This s**t comin' in by the ton ton
[01:06.89]I started this rap s**t for fun yeah
[01:08.45]Last weekend I was in Milan Milan
[01:10.31]You n***as ain't did what I done yeah
[01:12.05]We f**k and then rise to that sun the sun
[01:13.79]My girl got a bag full of buns yeah
[01:15.50]Hit it I speed up the Porsche skrt
[01:17.30]911 it's a sport sport
[01:18.82]They pay to listen to my voice voice
[01:20.57]Rich or poor gotta make you a choice choice
[01:22.34]I could play with your heart make her moist yeah
[01:23.88]Told her call me she don't need a toy call
[01:25.67]I'm a saucy young n***a no soy soy
[01:27.29]And they know not to play with the boy yeah
[01:29.23]Still poppin' Xans 2019
[01:30.80]Pour up the lean got me stuck in a dream
[01:32.71]Started hittin' licks back in 2014
[01:34.32]I got the ice on me dripping Céline
[01:36.03]Flyers came in off a hunt
[01:37.47]Me and my n***as still drippin' for fun
[01:39.48]Been knew I was the one
[01:40.85]Still got n***as on the run yeah
[01:48.61]Ayy Royce you did it right here
data.trans:
[ti:Stuck In A Dream (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Mosey/Gunna]
[al:Stuck In A Dream (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.69]//
[00:03.39]//
[00:05.09]//
[00:05.63]Royce David制作
[00:07.06]2019年 依然喜欢那玩意儿
[00:08.63]来点特制饮料 让我昏睡不醒
[00:10.51]2014年就开始发财
[00:12.01]金银珠宝身上戴 Céline衣服随便穿
[00:13.69]超级跑车说来就来
[00:15.44]我和我的兄弟们依然过得很潇洒
[00:17.25]一直很明白 我就是人中龙凤
[00:18.90]还是有些朋友疲于奔命
[00:21.17]钻石闪闪亮晶晶 项链晃啊晃
[00:22.96]我有钱得很 但我一点都没变
[00:24.56]口气大得很 好像你想惹事儿啊
[00:26.21]我们也想找你算算账
[00:27.92]我买了一条新项链
[00:29.70]现在脖子上有十条项链了
[00:31.43]后来又买了百达翡丽
[00:33.22]开着跑车 带着冲锋枪
[00:34.57]新衣服 新跑车 管他多少钱 买就是了
[00:36.17]我现在嗨得很 手上的枪让我底气十足
[00:38.00]生来就很优秀 不费吹灰之力 就让她为我宽衣解带
[00:39.73]抽着那种玩意儿 我真的很快乐
[00:41.37]去年还穷得很 今年就戴上了镶钻的百达翡丽
[00:42.77]西雅图的房子里 我放了五万块
[00:44.55]我和她玩两次 就可以让给你们了
[00:46.63]我的小弟开车出现 掏出枪就是一顿打
[00:48.25]2019年 依然喜欢那玩意儿
[00:49.65]来点特制饮料 让我昏睡不醒
[00:51.70]2014年就开始发财
[00:53.14]金银珠宝身上戴 Céline衣服随便穿
[00:54.91]超级跑车说来就来
[00:56.58]我和我的兄弟们依然过得很潇洒
[00:58.32]一直很明白 我就是人中龙凤
[00:59.76]还是有些朋友疲于奔命
[01:01.82]我从街头打拼出来了
[01:03.48]我还是有一些朋友疲于奔命
[01:05.24]这玩意儿源源不断地往我兜里来
[01:06.89]我做说唱都是为了好玩
[01:08.45]上周我在米兰
[01:10.31]我做过的事情 你们都没做过
[01:12.05]我们彻夜狂欢 直到太阳升起
[01:13.79]我的姑娘包包里面装满了票子
[01:15.50]踩下油门 我开着保时捷加速前进
[01:17.30]保时捷911 运动跑车
[01:18.82]他们花钱听我唱歌
[01:20.57]想富还是想穷 你得做个选择
[01:22.34]我可以撩拨你的心肝宝贝 让她兴奋不已
[01:23.88]我叫她联系我 她不用自娱自乐
[01:25.67]我是个时尚的年轻小伙 不是开玩笑的
[01:27.29]他们都知道不能和我胡来
[01:29.23]2019年 依然喜欢那玩意儿
[01:30.80]来点特制饮料 让我昏睡不醒
[01:32.71]2014年就开始发财
[01:34.32]金银珠宝身上戴 Céline衣服随便穿
[01:36.03]超级跑车说来就来
[01:37.47]我和我的兄弟们依然过得很潇洒
[01:39.48]一直很明白 我就是人中龙凤
[01:40.85]还是有些朋友疲于奔命
[01:48.61]Royce David制作
